comment.author: 61804295@N00
comment._content: Maybe this is the same hotel!!

comment.author: 81472222@N00
comment._content: Bill - The buildings are very similar and may of had the same builder. However, my photo was taken in South Grafton NSW. Fernmount is situated near Bellingen NSW. Grafton is built on the flat flood plain of the Clarence River whilst you can see that the hotel on Fernmount is on undulating country.
